start:
*Hello, this is albaath\-marks bot*
  
  *Bot manual:*
  
  1\. Enter the id\-number of a student to get his marks as a text message
  2\. You can enter many numbers in one message
  3\. To make it as HTML file use `/html` command followed by id\-number
  4\. To select a specific range usw `/in\_range` command followed by two numbers start, end
  5\. Also, if you want marks for a specific year,use command `/year1`, `/year2` \.\.\. `/year5`

  Good luck
